title: Sopeace Party Decoration Kit White Yellow Black Tissue Paper Pom Poms Flowers Papers Lanterns Circle Garland Birthday Wedding Christening Frozen Theme Party Decorations for Adults Boys Girls
features: Package includes: 3 * 8 inch paper lantern, 3 * 10 inch paper lantern, 3 * 8 inch tissue paper flower, 3 * 10 inch tissue paper flower,3 * 6inch white honeycomb ball

Hang a variety of small, medium and large paper lanterns randomly across the whole marquee lining using our transparent clips; tie fishing line between the clips and paper lanterns to hang them at the desired heights.
It looks great hanging from ceilings, doorways, and lighting fixtures, mounted on the walls, or used as table centerpieces.
Hanging tissue paper lantern/tissue pom poms garland for birthday/baby shower/wedding decorations party supplies
And economic way to light up your party. Ships flat,easy to unfold and the lanterns can be used again and again.
description: Product Details 1>Hand made using premium paper . 2>Each pom pom comes with white ribbon and instructions. 3>Pre-cut pieces for easy folding each sheet and fluff into shape to create beautiful and realistic paper flower pom-poms. 4>Lightweight and easy to hang them from the ceiling, above a table, under the verandah, or from branches in trees 5>Perfect for any occasion: Birthday, Wedding, Christening Baby shower, Kitchen tea, Nursery decorations or any other celebration. How to DIY paper flower? 1>Unfold the party ball, fanning out the tissue paper. Ensure the ribbon is centered along the length of paper. 2>Pull on each point of paper at one end of tissue, fluffing each point to the centre of the ball. When all points have been fluffed, this should form half a sphere. 3>Hold party ball by ribbon so as the fluffed part of ball is upside down and start to fluff all points of the other half of the ball. once this step is finished you will have a full arty ball and you can hanging this where you like by the ribbon. Note 1>They are made out of tissue so the material is a bit thin. They shouldn't tear if you take your time opening them and putting them together. 2>The colors can appear slightly different due to various factors: lighting, monitor, manufacturer batch color variation.
